title: Case Management Operations
purpose: Central hub for managing case lifecycle from creation to closure, coordinating all litigation activities

workflowContext.dataFlow: Cases receive client and authority context, then spawn hearings, tasks, and documents throughout the litigation lifecycle

tabs.name: Lifecycle

tabs.whenToUse: Advancing cases between stages, reviewing stage prerequisites, handling remands

tabs.name: Timeline
tabs.purpose: Chronological record of all case events
tabs.whenToUse: Pre-hearing preparation, case history review, audit trail

tabs.name: Documents
tabs.whenToUse: Uploading evidence, organizing case files, generating documents from templates

tabs.name: Hearings
tabs.whenToUse: Scheduling new hearings, reviewing past hearings, tracking outcomes

tabs.name: AI Assistant
tabs.purpose: Intelligent case analysis and drafting support
tabs.whenToUse: Complex case analysis, draft generation, precedent research

tabs.name: Communications
tabs.whenToUse: Sending updates, tracking message delivery, logging external communications

quickActions.trigger: Click '+ New Case' button or use Ctrl+N
quickActions.outcome: Opens case creation wizard with client selection
quickActions.bestPractice: Ensure client exists first; have notice details ready

quickActions.outcome: Moves case to next legal stage if prerequisites met
quickActions.bestPractice: Complete stage checklist items before advancing

quickActions.outcome: Creates hearing linked to current case
quickActions.bestPractice: Check calendar for conflicts before confirming

quickActions.outcome: Sends templated or custom email to client contacts
quickActions.bestPractice: Use templates for consistency; preview before sending

commonWorkflows.name: Daily Case Review
steps: Open Case Management from sidebar
Apply 'My Cases' filter to see assigned cases
Check SLA status indicators (red = breached)
Review cases with hearings in next 7 days
Note urgent items for immediate action

commonWorkflows.name: Weekly Stage Review
steps: Filter cases by 'Ready to Advance' status
Open each case's Lifecycle tab
Verify stage prerequisites are complete
Advance eligible cases to next stage
Document any blockers for stuck cases

commonWorkflows.name: Pre-Hearing Case Preparation
steps: Open case with upcoming hearing
Navigate to Timeline tab for event history
Review all documents in Documents tab
Check AI Assistant for case summary
Verify all prerequisites in Hearings tab

commonWorkflows.name: Case Closure Process
steps: Verify final order is uploaded
Ensure all tasks are completed or cancelled
Send final communication to client
Advance to 'Closed' stage
Archive case if no further action needed

warnings.title: Stage Advancement is Irreversible
warnings.message: Once a case advances to the next stage, it cannot be moved back except through a formal Remand process. Verify all prerequisites before advancing.

warnings.title: Closing Cases Restricts Editing
warnings.message: Closed cases become read-only. Ensure all data is complete before marking a case as closed.

warnings.title: SLA Calculations
warnings.message: SLA status is calculated based on statutory deadlines and reply due dates. Yellow indicates 50% time elapsed; red indicates deadline passed.

warnings.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
warnings.message: Use Ctrl+K to open quick search, Ctrl+N for new case, and arrow keys to navigate case list.

troubleshooting.solution: Clear all filters, check Data Scope setting, verify assignment
Check stage checklist, verify case status, confirm role permissions
Verify case dates, check statutory deadline configuration
